tool_description: Get an improved translation without the premium prices - supported for over 64 languages
name: My Translator Pro
title: My Translator Pro

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: Endpoint to send text to be translated
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-translator-pro.p.rapidapi.com/api/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-translator-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://my-translator-pro.p.rapidapi.com/api/translate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-translator-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
